name: Devout Theists
description: Devout Theists explores themes of faith, belief, and religious devotion. Characters in this script often have abilities related to faith, conviction, and spiritual matters.
author: Emerald
specialRules: Focus on faith and spiritual themes
Characters with religious or faith-based abilities
Explores concepts of belief and conviction
setupNotes: This script delves into themes of faith and spirituality. Players should consider the religious undertones when interpreting character abilities.

winConditions.evil: Survive to equal the number of good players

howToRun: Likely features alignment/madness pledges or holy-themed protections. Make any vow/madness consequences explicit and consistent.

firstNight.description: Wake all Minions together. Show them who the other Minions are and who the Demon is
Wake the Demon. Show them who their Minions are. Give them 3 character tokens as bluffs

tipsAndTricks: Good: Coordinate vows to net info without locking key roles. Evil: Weaponize vow constraints to trap truth-tellers.
bluffing: Claim blessed protection or absolution to explain survivals and misreads.
